name: NVD CVE API
description: NIST National Vulnerability Database API for querying CVE vulnerability data with severity scores and references

name: MITRE ATT&CK TAXII
description: TAXII 2.1 API providing access to the MITRE ATT&CK knowledge base of adversary tactics and techniques in STIX format

name: MalwareBazaar
description: Free malware sample sharing service by abuse.ch with API for querying, uploading and downloading malware samples

name: CIRCL CVE Search
description: Free CVE search API by CIRCL Luxembourg providing vulnerability information lookup without authentication

name: CIRCL Hashlookup
description: Free file hash lookup service to check if a file is known in various databases like NSRL

name: Hybrid Analysis
description: Free online malware analysis sandbox by CrowdStrike with API for submitting files and retrieving analysis reports

name: MalShare
description: Free malware repository providing API access to download samples, search hashes and retrieve malware intelligence

name: Malpedia
description: Curated malware encyclopedia by Fraunhofer FKIE with API for querying malware families, actors and YARA rules

name: MWDB (Malware Database)
description: CERT.pl malware repository with REST API for storing and analyzing malware samples and their configurations

name: ThreatFox
description: Free IOC sharing platform by abuse.ch for querying and sharing indicators of compromise like IPs, domains and URLs

name: URLhaus
description: Free URL threat intelligence by abuse.ch for looking up and sharing malicious URLs used for malware distribution

name: Feodo Tracker
description: Tracks botnet C&C servers associated with banking trojans like Dridex and Emotet with free API access

name: SSLBL (SSL Blacklist)
description: Free SSL certificate blacklist by abuse.ch identifying malicious SSL certificates used by botnet C&C servers

name: DShield API
description: SANS Internet Storm Center API providing threat intelligence data on IP addresses, ports and attack trends

name: CVEAPI
description: Simple free API for querying CVE vulnerability data with no authentication required

name: EmailRep
description: Free API to query email address reputation and detect disposable, spam or malicious email addresses

name: CyCAT
description: Cybersecurity Resource Catalogue API providing structured access to cybersecurity tools, rules and resources

name: BinaryEdge
description: Search engine API for internet-connected devices providing data on open ports, vulnerabilities and services

name: Criminal IP
description: Cyber threat intelligence search engine API for scanning and analyzing IP addresses, domains and URLs

name: IPQualityScore
description: Free tier fraud detection API for IP reputation, email validation, phone validation and URL scanning

name: MetaDefender Cloud
description: Free multi-engine malware scanning API by OPSWAT supporting file, URL, IP and hash analysis

name: FIRST.org API
description: API by Forum of Incident Response providing data about CERTs, CVSS calculator and security teams worldwide

name: Focsec
description: Free IP intelligence API for detecting VPNs, proxies, Tor exit nodes and bot traffic

name: Onyphe
description: Cyber defense search engine API providing data on internet-connected devices, vulnerabilities and threats

name: ORKL
description: Free search engine API for cyber threat intelligence reports from various security researchers and organizations

name: Spyse (AttackSurface)
description: Internet assets search engine providing data on domains, IPs, certificates and autonomous systems

name: FullHunt
description: Attack surface discovery API for finding exposed assets, subdomains, open ports and technologies

name: LeakLookup
description: API for searching leaked databases to check if credentials have been compromised in data breaches

name: MISP
description: Open source threat intelligence platform with comprehensive REST API for sharing and managing threat indicators

name: Cisco Talos Intelligence
description: Enterprise-grade threat intelligence feeds from Cisco providing IP and domain reputation data

name: MSRC Security Updates
description: Microsoft Security Response Center API for querying security updates, CVEs and advisories

name: Vulners
description: Vulnerability database API aggregating data from NVD, exploits, patches and security advisories

name: OpenCVE
description: Free CVE alerting platform with API to track and search vulnerabilities by vendor and product

name: Exploit-DB
description: Archive of public exploits maintained by Offensive Security with searchable API access

name: National Cyber Awareness System
description: CISA alerts and advisories API providing current threat and vulnerability information

name: Threat Jammer
description: REST API for developers to access threat intelligence data including IP, domain and email reputation

name: APIVoid
description: Collection of security APIs for IP reputation, domain reputation, URL checking and email verification

name: Cloudflare Radar
description: Free API providing internet traffic insights, DDoS attack data, routing security and threat trends

name: Netcraft
description: Anti-phishing and cybercrime detection API for checking URLs and domains against known threats

name: ZeroSSL API
description: Free SSL certificate issuance API supporting ACME protocol for automated certificate management

name: Let's Encrypt ACME
description: Free automated certificate authority API for issuing and managing TLS/SSL certificates via ACME protocol

name: Certificate Transparency Logs
description: Google CT Log API for searching and monitoring issued SSL/TLS certificates for domain security

name: crt.sh
description: Free certificate transparency search API for finding all SSL/TLS certificates issued for a domain

name: Spamhaus
description: Domain and IP blocklist API providing reputation data to combat spam, phishing and malware

name: StopForumSpam
description: Free anti-spam API checking usernames, emails and IPs against a database of known forum spammers

name: Disposable Email Detector
description: Free API to check if an email address belongs to a disposable or temporary email service

name: HackerOne API
description: API for accessing public vulnerability disclosure reports and bug bounty program information

name: IP ASN History
description: CIRCL D4 project API providing historical BGP and ASN data for IP address intelligence

name: NeutrinoAPI IP Blocklist
description: Free tier API for checking if an IP address is on blocklists for spam, botnets or malicious activity

name: Bluecoat Site Review
description: Symantec URL categorization and analysis service for checking website safety classification

name: CVEDetails
description: Free CVE security vulnerability database with TAXII/STIX feeds and detailed vulnerability statistics

name: OSV (Open Source Vulnerabilities)
description: Google-backed API for querying vulnerabilities in open source packages across multiple ecosystems

name: Snyk Vulnerability DB
description: Free vulnerability database API for open source libraries covering npm, pip, Maven and more

name: GitHub Security Advisories
description: GraphQL API for querying GitHub's security advisory database covering software vulnerabilities

name: Maltiverse
description: Free threat intelligence API providing IOC enrichment for IPs, domains, URLs and file hashes

name: IntelOwl
description: Open source threat intelligence automation platform with API aggregating multiple analyzers and scanners

name: EasyDMARC
description: Free email security tools API for DMARC, SPF, DKIM lookup and domain reputation checking

name: WPScan
description: Free API for scanning WordPress vulnerabilities including plugins, themes and core version issues

name: CAPEC (Common Attack Pattern Enumeration)
description: MITRE's catalog of attack patterns available via API with detailed descriptions and mitigations

name: Internet Archive Wayback Machine
description: Check historical snapshots of websites for security research and detecting defacements or changes
